sources.title: On Your Guard
sources.description: A criminal intends to rob a bank in a small country town, but becomes involved with protecting three orphans that he encounters instead.

sources.title: On Your Guard (1933) RICHARD TALMADGEüçï DOROTHY BURGESS
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Dorothy Burgess, Bobby Nelson
Director: George Crone

An ex-con, fresh out of the slammer, is hunting for an easy score. Can a pair of orphans, played by Dorothy Burgess and Bobby Nelson, set Dick on a path of redemption?

TRIVIA: Richard Talmadge, born Sylvester Ricardo Metzetti, was a member of the Flying Metzettis, a family of acrobats renowned for originating the quadruple back somersault!

metadata.Plot: An ex-con makes for a backwoods town intending to rob the bank, and becomes involved in protecting three orphans from land swindlers instead.
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Dorothy Burgess, Edmund Breese
